name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. William C. ZILLGITT, Appellant

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX AND MANDERINO, JJ.
JONES, C. J., took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. William C. ZILLGITT, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
JONES, C. J., took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Anthony V. DeCello, DeCello, Bua & Manifesto, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert F. Banks, First Asst. Dist. Atty., Joseph J. Nelson, Mercer, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
359 A.2d 366
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. William C. ZILLGITT, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 23, 1975.
Decided July 6, 1976.
Anthony V. DeCello, DeCello, Bua & Manifesto, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert F. Banks, First Asst. Dist. Atty., Joseph J. Nelson, Mercer, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX AND MANDERINO, JJ.
